mapper.select: SELECT replyCheck,r.reviewNum, r.clubReview, r.replyNum, r.reviewReply, r.writeDate, r.userId, r.clubNum, u.nickname as nickName, u.user_img as userImg FROM ( SELECT REPLY_CHECK as replyCheck,REVIEW_NUM AS reviewNum, CLUB_REVIEW AS clubReview, reply_num AS replyNum, REVIEW_REPLY AS reviewReply, write_date AS writeDate, user_id AS userId, CLUB_NUM AS clubNum FROM ( SELECT REPLY_CHECK,REVIEW_NUM, CLUB_REVIEW, 0 AS REPLY_NUM, '' AS REVIEW_REPLY, WRITE_DATE, USER_ID, CLUB_NUM FROM CLUB_REVIEW UNION ALL SELECT 0,REVIEW_NUM, '', REPLY_NUM, REVIEW_REPLY, WRITE_DATE, user_id, ( SELECT CLUB_NUM FROM CLUB_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NUM = REVIEW_REPLY.REVIEW_NUM ) AS CLUB_NUM FROM REVIEW_REPLY ) WHERE club_num =#{club_num} ) r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.userId = u.user_id ORDER BY r.reviewNum, r.clubReview
mapper.insert: insert into INTEREST_LIST(USER_ID, CLUB_NUM, INTEREST_DATE) values(#{user_id},#{club_Num},sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete from INTEREST_LIST where user_id=#{user_id} and club_num=#{club_Num}
mapper.insert: insert into CLUB_REVIEW(REVIEW_NUM,CLUB_REVIEW, WRITE_DATE, USER_ID, CLUB_NUM) values(HAERAK.CLUB_REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{clubReview},sysdate,#{userId},#{clubNum})
insert into REVIEW_REPLY(REPLY_NUM, REVIEW_REPLY, WRITE_DATE, REVIEW_NUM) values(HAERAK.REVIEW_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{REVIEW_REPLY},sysdate,#{REVIEW_NUM});

insert into CLUB(CLUB_NUM, CLUB_NAME, INPUT_DATE, VIEW_CNT, PRICE, DETAIL_TXT,CLUB_ADDR, CLUB_DATE,CLUB_TIME ,LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, NUMBER_PEOPLE, CLUB_STATUS, ACTI_AREA_NUM, CATEGORY_NUM, USER_ID) values(club_seq.NEXTVAL,#{clubName},sysdate,0,#{price},#{detailTxt},#{clubAddr}, #{clubDate},#{clubTime},#{longitude},#{latitude},#{numberPeople},'모집중',#{actiAreaNum},#{categoryNum},#{userId})
insert into club_img(club_img_num, club_num, club_img) values (club_img_seq.nextval, CLUB_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{clubImg} )
mapper.select: select CLUB_NAME as clubName, DETAIL_TXT as detailTxt, NUMBER_PEOPLE as numberPeople, PRICE, CLUB_DATE as clubDate , CLUB_ADDR as clubAddr, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE,CLUB_TIME as clubTime,club_Num as clubNum from club where club_num=#{club_num}
